description: Information about the response that could be relevant for the Beacon client in order to interpret the results.

beaconId.description: Identifier of the beacon, as defined in `Beacon`.

returnedGranularity.description: Requested granularity. Targeted Beacon could respond or not with the requested granularity. E.g. record level granularity could be requested, but the Beacon could respond only with boolean or count results.

receivedRequestSummary.description: Section of the response that summarize the request received as it has been interpreted by teh Beacon server.
